import { useState } from 'react' const EditTodo = ({ todo, editTodo }) => { const [task, setTask] = useState(todo.task) console.log(`task is ${task}`) const inputHandler = (event) => { setTask(event.target.value) } const onSaveChanges = () => { editTodo({...todo, task: task}) } return (
setTask(todo.task)}>
Edit Todo
) } export default EditTodo
